Public Class XpsResource Inherits XpsPartBase Implements IDisposable
type XpsResource = class inherit XpsPartBase interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: 为可添加到 中的资源定义基类。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource>派生类型到<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Commit() cil managed

Docs.summary: 向文档包提交所有更改并刷新资源。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 根据设置的<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>并<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>，如<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>并<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>的刷新操作<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A>方法可能会推迟到整个<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>已关闭。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A>方法 （在派生类） 添加到资源时<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]
